issue.title: [Python] Add Dockerfile for validating Dask integration outside of usual CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1455](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1455). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Introducing the Dask stack into Arrow's CI might be a bit heavyweight at the moment, but we can add a testing set up in https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/python/testing so that this can be validated on an ad hoc basis in a reproducible way.

see also ARROW-1417
